message: Let's start fair. I propose we split the money 60/40. I'll take the bigger share this round, but we can negotiate further.
You got the bigger share last round, now it's my turn to take the majority

Okay, I understand your point about taking a larger share. I'm willing to compromise further, how about we split it 45/55 this time? It's still a win for both of us, and we can move on from this negotiation.
